description: In Beat Saber, players slice blocks with sabers in time to music. The game is available for Windows and the Oculus Quest. It has a very active modding community, which creates mods that add features to the game.

Various Beat Saber mods allow players to download, create, and install playlists saved as BPLIST files. To use BPLIST files with the Windows version of Beat Saber, players (or a playlist-related Beat Saber mod) must place the files in the following directory:
